label: Claim Validation
description: Validate marketing and scientific claims against regulatory requirements across different markets.

defaultOutputs.name: ID
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Unique identifier for each claim validation result.

defaultOutputs.name: Proposed Claim
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The marketing or scientific claim text being validated (e.g. "Promotes hair growth", "Reduces hair fall").

defaultOutputs.name: Claim Type
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Type of claim: "Marketing" for consumer-facing claims or "Scientific" for technical/evidence-based claims.

defaultOutputs.name: Validation Status
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Overall validation result: "VALID" (approved), "INVALID" (not allowed), or "CONDITIONALLY VALID" (allowed with modifications).

defaultOutputs.name: Claim Issue
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Specific regulatory issue identified with the claim (e.g. "Drug-like wording", "Evidence gap", "Therapeutic implication").

defaultOutputs.name: Market-Specific Compliance Issue
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Detailed explanation of the compliance problem specific to the target market's regulations.

defaultOutputs.name: Conditional Usage Rules
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Restrictions or conditions for using the claim if conditionally valid (e.g. "Not allowed", "Allowed only with softened cosmetic wording").

defaultOutputs.name: Suggestion
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Recommended action to make the claim compliant (e.g. "Rewrite to appearance-based wording only", "Add â‰¥8-week human shedding-count study").

configSchema.label: Available Evidence
configSchema.tooltip: Upload evidence documents supporting the claims (e.g. in vitro studies, ex vivo penetration studies, human biomarker studies). Supported formats: PDF, Word, TXT, CSV.

configSchema.label: Proposed Claim
configSchema.placeholder: Enter claim text or upload a claim list...
configSchema.tooltip: Enter the marketing or scientific claim text directly (e.g. "Promotes hair growth by strengthening scalp barrier") or upload a file containing multiple claims.

configSchema.label: Claim Type
configSchema.tooltip: Select one or more claim types to validate. Marketing claims are consumer-facing, while scientific claims are technical/evidence-based.

configSchema.label: Region
configSchema.tooltip: Select the target market/region for claim validation. Different regions have varying regulatory requirements for cosmetic and therapeutic claims.
